text: Ore atrivim, nɨ ifuegh akam gumazamiziba bagh anemadaghtɨ, me bar gumazamizir kabav sueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregh. Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, nɨ ifueghɨva akam gumazamiziba bagh anemadaghtɨ, me gumazamizir kabav sueghtɨ me arɨghiregh. Kɨ guizbangɨra nɨ mɨgei, nɨ kamaghɨn damightɨ kɨ 10 tausen silvan dagɨaba isɨ nɨn dagɨar dɨpenim datɨgham, eghtɨ me dagɨar kabar atrivimɨn ingangarir kam damuam.”
